name: Beauty School Dropout - Die For You... V1

metadata.description:
we want to show you something..

this is our song die for you... but the 1st version of the idea...

we did this because we wanted to show how art changes. as we bring more brain power into something, creations evolve and this is a beautiful part of the process.

why are you guys dropping old demos as NFT’s instead of new finished music you might ask… 

being an artist is by no means an easy feat. Your product requires vulnerability in its rawest form, generally in an attempt to reach masses. that said, often times so much of the musical process gets overlooked as the consumer is generally receiving the final and most polished version of the music.

as a band we believe in pushing boundaries, exposing all the layers of our artistry, and showing you every aspect of what’s it’s taken for us to get to where we are now to give a deeper look into our work.

this is exactly what sparked our collection WORKS OF PROGRESS.

lyrics.text:
Hook:
I mean it when I say it
That I’ll die for you
Gotta drop the top off
If I say that I’m gonna ride for you

I don’t care what you say now
Ya I’ll never stop loving you
Now you got your guards up
Gonna play hard like I lied to you
But I’ll never lie to you

Verse 1:
Thought that we could play pretend love
Thought that we could make amends
Get lucky roll again
And Spend a day laid up
Tied up in the bedroom
Things I used to show you

If you want to want to
Want to want to touch
Like we used to
Keep talking talking talking love
It’s what I’m used to
Verse 2:
Lust, funny how you
Talk about bout love
But now you can’t take
It you’re on the run
Need to slow down the pace ya
I see you going new places
You’re off the leash and
You’re chasing Nirvana

Too soon to be going out messin round
Heart breaks when the dj starts to bring it down
Slow dance with yourself in a lonely crowd
And now the moments hitting right back when you look around

Hook:
I mean it when I say it
That I’ll die for you
Gotta drop the top off
If I say that I’m gonna ride for you

I don’t care what you say now
Ya I’ll never stop loving you
Now you got your guards up
Gonna play hard like I lied to you
But I’ll never lie to you
